about_the_game:
Touhou Ibunseki - Ayaria Dawn: ReCreation Soundtrack contains all Doujin and original BGMs in this game including those in the intermission and battlescene, 80+ min length in total! Vocal version of main title and Chen's BGM are also presented, and an extra 8-bit main menu BGM is served as a bonus! Enjoy your listening!
* This work is a Doujin-work of Touhou Project which is originally composed by Team Shanghai Alice
